{"header":"

Imprest Requisition and Petty Cash

{{ doc.name }}

","sections":[{"label":"","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Company","fieldname":"company","fieldtype":"Link","options":"Company"},{"label":"Posting Date","fieldname":"posting_date","fieldtype":"Date"},{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

Total Amount: {{frappe.format(doc.total_debit,{'fieldtype':'Currency'})}}

Total Amount(In Words): {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_debit)}}

"}]},{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Employee","fieldname":"employee","fieldtype":"Link","options":"Employee"},{"label":"Payment Mode","fieldname":"payment_mode","fieldtype":"Link","options":"Mode of Payment"},{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"{% set emp = frappe.get_doc('Employee',doc.employee) %}

Names: {{emp.first_name}} {{emp.middle_name}} {{emp.last_name}}

"}]}],"has_fields":true},{"label":"","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

{{doc.narration}}

"},{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

I hereby apply for standing/travel/cash imprest for the purpose designed above with travel schedule and cost estimate sheet attached and I undertake to the present imprest by due date.

Signature of Applicant:     ____________________________     {{doc.posting_date}}

"}]}],"page_break":false},{"label":"Expenditures","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":" {% for exp in doc.expenditure %} {% endfor %}
Expense Account Description Quantity Rate Amount
{{exp.expense_account}} {{exp.description}} {{exp.quantity}} {{frappe.format(exp.rate,{'fieldtype':'Currency'})}} {{frappe.format(exp.amount,{'fieldtype':'Currency'})}}
"}]}],"has_fields":true},{"label":"","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

Managing Director/GMF & A/RM/OIC Signature:

{{doc.posting_date}}

"}]},{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

Head of Department(HOD):

________________________________________

{{doc.posting_date}}

"}]}],"has_fields":true},{"label":"","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"

Checked By: ___________________ Examined By: ___________________

Head of Finance: ___________________

Bank Account No.: _________________ Check No.: _________________ Date: {{doc.posting_date}}

I certify having received the above cash/cheque of: {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_debit)}}

Signature of Applicant:     ____________________________     Date: {{doc.posting_date}}

"}]}]}]}
name: Imprest Requisition and Petty Cash Application form
